Section 12 of the National School Lunch Act is amended to include grants for identification and enrollment efforts for eligible entities such as schools to help children enroll in state health plans. The curr_chunk discusses the authorized uses of grant funds for various entities participating in nutrition programs, including schools, child and adult care institutions, local agencies, and social service providers. It also mentions the funding source for these grants. The Secretary of the Treasury will provide $6,000,000 annually for fiscal years 2000 through 2003 to carry out the subsection without further appropriation.
